dmca.title: Hollygator: Demand for Immediate Takedown of Stolen Jennifer
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Edward Ruttenberg [mailto:eruttenberg@lpsla.com] 
Sent: Saturday, May 12, 2007 8:38 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: FW: Hollygator: Demand for Immediate Takedown of Stolen
Jennifer Aniston Photos

 

I am forwarding this takedown notice to the address that you requested.

 

________________________________

From: Edward Ruttenberg
Sent: Fri 5/11/2007 6:12 PM
To: 'maxmovies@fastwebnet.it'; 'support@hostgator.com';
'abuse@theplanet.com'
Cc: 'Hampton, Carolyn (NBC Universal)'; Burg, David (NBC Universal);
Ragsac, Ted (NBC Universal); Thomas Peistrup
Subject: Hollygator: Demand for Immediate Takedown of Stolen Jennifer
Aniston Photos

Attached is a letter demanding that the stolen photos of Jennifer
Aniston be taken down immediately from your website and not further
exploited.

 

Edward A. Ruttenberg, Esq.

LEOPOLD, PETRICH & SMITH, P.C.

2049 Century Park East, Suite, 3110

Los Angeles, California 90067-3274

Phone:  310/277-3333

    Fax:  310/277-7444
